meta_description: The Momentary brings together contemporary visual, performing, and culinary arts into a welcoming, communal space in Northwest Arkansas.

admission_text:
# Membership

### 

### YOUR PLACE TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE

When you become a member of the Momentary, you join a diverse community with new offerings and dynamic art experiences. 

**Did you know?** A 10% discount is available on all membership levels for educators, seniors (62+), students, military, and Crystal Bridges and the Momentary volunteers.

Memberships are also family friendly! All Momentary member levels include benefits for all children ages 18 and under in the member household.

> Already a member? [Log in](https://tickets.crystalbridges-themomentary.org/account/upcomingevents) to access your account, tickets, and membership. 

### Give the gift of membership!

[Give TODAY](https://tickets.crystalbridges-themomentary.org/donate/contribute2)

### MO MEMBER

#### $75 ANNUALLY

  * Advance notification about and early access to ticketed shows, [events](https://themomentary.org/calendar/), and festivals
  * 20% discount on general admission event tickets and special members-only offers (exclusions may apply)*
  * Member priority lines
  * Members-only events and experiences
  * Free coffee in the Tower Bar
  * 10% year-round discount in the [Momentary Shop](http://shop.crystalbridges.org) and [Crystal Bridges Museum Store](https://crystalbridges.org/museum-store/)
  * 10% discount on room rate at [21c Museum Hotels](https://www.21cmuseumhotels.com/) (Bentonville, St. Louis, and Kansas City locations)
  * $10 discount on [Crystal Bridges membership](https://crystalbridg...

collections_text:
# Home

# _your place to be  
_

##### discover live music, explore captivating art in the galleries, catch a great event, or just Relax

[EVENT CALENDAR](https://themomentary.org/calendar/) [PLAN YOUR VISIT](https://themomentary.org/plan-your-visit/)

## Hi, we’re the Momentary.

And we’re all about the art of the moment. Designed as a platform for today’s art, food, and music, we’re a [decommissioned cheese factory-turned-creative-hub](https://themomentary.org/history/) and [extension of Crystal Bridges](https://crystalbridges.org/) focused on connecting communities—and you—to great experiences.

From [visual](https://themomentary.org/exhibitions/) and [performing arts](https://themomentary.org/performance/), to [live music](https://themomentary.org/music/), [culinary experiences](https://themomentary.org/food-and-drink/), [artists-in-residence](https://themomentary.org/artist-in-residence-program/), and more, if it moves you, we’re into it.

So next time you’re in downtown Bentonville, Arkansas, make the Momentary your place to be. **Campus general admission is always free**.

See you soon.

[ ](https://www.youtube.com/embed/2nJZ1QHpD-8)
